ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Fuses
ResearchProjectDef.description: Builds makeshift fuses. Each one is enough to dissipate up to 2,500 W discharge, but will burn out if exceeded.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Fuses
ResearchProjectDef.description: Builds proper fuseboxes. Each one is enough to dissipate up to 3,000 W discharge and will never burn itself out.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Solar Flare Shielding
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct a magnetic shield that will protect electric devices in your colony from solar flares.
